game.shortDescription: In X-Blades, the player takes on the role of the enchanting heroine Ayumi, who survives a breathtaking dance of blades through the Hordes of Darkness. The long-haired beautiful anime, with her pistol blades and mind-blowing leaps, whirls and swirls from one fantastic level to the next.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In X-Blades, the player takes on the role of the enchanting heroine Ayumi, who survives a breathtaking dance of blades through the Hordes of Darkness. The long-haired beautiful anime, with her pistol blades and mind-blowing leaps, whirls and swirls from one fantastic level to the next.

reviewHighlights.text: 한마디로 요약하면 싼 값에 하는 액션게임 그 이상 이하도 아님 솔직히 이거 트레일러(브금)랑 세일쿠폰때문에 샀긴한데 해보니까 별로임... [strike]트레일러보면 스포당함[/strike] 장점은 써둬야하니까 장점을 말하면 일단 주인공 가슴이....아니 그래픽이 꽤 좋...
